Maple
will be on 'The Edge with Paula Zahn' show on Fox at 10:00 pm Tuesday, Oct.

Who is Karen Maple and what time zone is that in reference to? Thanks

R

messages.subject: karen maples interview: TONIGHT
messages.msgSnippet: sent to me by a friend
messages.messageBody:
sent to me by a friend
<< Douglas Kennedy at Fox News Channel tells me his interview with Karen Maple
will be on 'The Edge with Paula Zahn' show on Fox at 10:00 pm Tuesday, Oct.
12. Plan to pop in a VCR tape. The show is one hour long and will air again
on Wednesday (I believe at 3 am) and again on the weekend. See
www.foxnews.com for other listings.

Important for homeschoolers >>
